1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>¡Ach Diosal Sión, tol a moj wal a bitnelayi! ¡A moj wal tol chi yun tzet altebil ayach!</t>
2: <t>Masanil anima chi jay ayach, yujtol chi abc'al is txaj eb.</t>
3: <pb/><t>A wal co yobc'ulalil chon ak'on ayc'ayok, axa ach chi ton a joc'ay co mul on.</t>
4: <t>Tzalojc'ulal jet, yujtol ach max on a sic'can elok yet chon ayji bay a templo. Watx'xac'al jayji yuj watx'ilal ay yul atut, a ton a templo yet ayilal.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Ach Dios co Colomal, yin a tojolal chon a tak'wen yin onben c'ayubtakxac'al. A masanil eb anima cajan sat tx'otx' ti', c'al eb cajan sataktok a' mar, ok ach yaoc eb yipok c'ul.</t>
6: <t>Caw max otcan witzlak yin ak'balnen epalil.</t>
7: <t>Ach ton chak' numay bil sat a' aej, c'al ak'on numay uchlejbail xol conoblak.</t>
8: <t>A eb cajan ec' bay najat tx'otx'lak, chi bilaj eb satak onben tol c'ayubtakxac'al. Oj wali xan chi oc aw yin tzalojc'ulalil bay chi ajol c'u, masantac'al bay chi toj c'u.</t>
9: <t>Ayachc'al oc elon tx'otx', chak'on is nabil tx'otx' cax chak'on tit yawojal tx'otx'. A yetok a' aej chi el yakan, chak'on ch'ib ixim trigo. Caywal ton tu' chi yun a watx'nen tx'otx'.</t>
10: <t>Chi ocay el txolil tx'otx' tx'otx' oj, cax chak'on noj yuj aej is jobelakil tx'otx', cax chak'on c'unbok tx'otx' yuj yax nab, c'al ak'on a watx'c'ulalil yin satni el yawojal tx'otx'.</t>
11: <t>Xiwil sat awoj chi yak' yet junjun abil oj, axa asunlak xiwil nabil chi yak'a'.</t>
12: <t>Chi yaxbi el an ac'un bay tz'inan tx'otx', axa tzalanlak watx'xac'al chi yun yili.</t>
13: <t>A sat ac'al-lak chi nojcan el yuj no calnel, axa jobelak chi nojcan el yuj trigo, cax chi bitni eb masanil, chi el yaw eb yuj tzalojc'ulalil.</t>
